name: OBOP
author: Yves Bochatay

sections.description:
Propose an ad free alternative:

  • strengthen your editorial independance
  • secure your visitors’ loyalty
  • reading comfort and quicker viewing, meaning that more pages are consulted
  • expand your list of readers by appearing in the “discovery list” among our other partners

Read more http://www.obop.co/bepartner/ Watch it in action https://youtu.be/HEdPd61XFJc

More videos :

  1. https://youtu.be/uwjKmF_rvCc
  2. https://youtu.be/QmNfjes4uZg

This plugin is also available in french
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/obop directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Settings->Plugin Name screen to configure the plugin
  4. Add it has a widget or use it before/after every post.

short_description: The ad-free alternative ! This plugin helps you to integrate Obop in your website
